# DisplayFrequency

**Structure**

A type for specifying the minimum duration after one tip is shown before another tip will become eligible.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DisplayFrequency
```

## Overview

For more information on display frequency, see [doc://com.apple.TipKit/documentation/TipKit/Tips/ConfigurationOption/displayFrequency(_:)].

## Type Properties

- **daily**: A daily display frequency.
- **hourly**: A hourly display frequency.
- **immediate**: An immediate display frequency.
- **monthly**: A monthly display frequency.
- **weekly**: A weekly display frequency.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: DisplayFrequency
